Articles.Content:
I believe I already made one of these for another account, but I have not used it in a while so I thought it'd be a good idea to re-introduce myself.

I'm Yuriski, and avid Kerbanaut (Kerbinaut? Kerbalnaut? Please correct me.) and a KSP Roleplayer - mainly the reason why I forgot about the main forum. I like wolves, foxes (mainly anthro wolves and foxes) and I love playing Team Fortress 2, Mafia 2, Rome: Total War: the list is endless. Did I mention I also like Soviet history?

Looking forward to talking to many of you!

Hey Yuriski, welcome back to the forums! I hope you find them as good as they were when you left.

Have fun and happy launchings!
